section.p: The net is hauled up out of the water and bundled aboard. Despite her slender frame, the mermaid struggles like a frenzied shark, thrashing the deck with her tail and spitting curses in the liquid tongue of the undersea folk.

The mate steps forward and cracks her over the head with a cudgel, laying her out cold. A hasty search yields only a
mermaid’s comb and
. Either of these can be sold at any market for 50 Shards.

At the mate’s advice, you order the mermaid thrown back into the sea before she can come round and lay a curse on the ship. As she sinks below the waves, you raise the mainsail and resume your voyage without further delay. .
